turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Good day, Assistant.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need you to assist me in ordering a cup of espresso coffee from Starbucks.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, a cup of espresso coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what did you want to order?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you want espresso or coffee?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: those are two different things.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I said I need a cup of coffee.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you want one cup of coffee. what size?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, a tall size.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hot or iced.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I need it really hot, extremely hot. I need whipped cream.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: (deleted)

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok. did you want milk in that?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: what kind?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: starbucks has 2% milk, does that work for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: All right. No problem.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: so you want 1 tall super hot coffee with 2% milk.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That is all for now.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: did you need anything else?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: the total is $3.45. where should i place the order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: There is a Starbucks on Rockefeller Center, we use that.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: got it. i've placed the order at the starbucks in rockefeller center. it'll be ready in 10 mins for pick up. do you need anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No, that is all for now. Thank you very much.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok good bye.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Goodbye.
